articles.author: Khanyiso Tshwaku
articles.title: Rocking Rilee Rossouw joins elite batters group after T20 World Cup ton
articles.description: Proteas batter Rilee Rossouw has joined David Miller in a select group of T20 willow-wielders who have crossed the individual 100 mark twice in T20 international cricket.
articles.content:
• Rilee Rossouw joined a select group of batters with two or more T20 100s when he bashed a ton against Bangladesh in Sydney.
  • He is the second South African to cross the mark after Davi… [+2021 chars]

articles.title: "Dear Kejriwal Ji": BJP's Gautam Gambhir Posts Old Letter Amid Garbage Row
articles.description: "I'd like to draw your attention to the biggest landfill site in Asia, which is in my constituency," ex-cricketer shares 2020 letter to Mr Kejriwal
articles.content:
Gautam Gambhir is BJP MP from East Delhi.
New Delhi: BJP's East Delhi MP, former cricketer Gautam Gambhir took strike against Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal over the Ghazipur landfill that falls in … [+2035 chars]

articles.title: PCB hands Umar Akmal three-year ban from all cricket | ESPNcricinfo.com

articles.content: Umar Akmal's troubled cricket career has hit its biggest roadblock yet, with the PCB handing him a ban from all representative cricket for three years after he pleaded guilty of failing to report det… [+1506 chars]

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
